Review.Contenu: I have requested to join your affiliate program on CJ but still my request is pending, please approve my application I'm very much interested to join your affiliate program and promote on my website and earn as a legit.I use cj affiliates with this email address you can contact me and my cj affiliate id is (6269842) Omaari. Thanks i hope a good reply that will make me happy.

Review.Titre: it is very difficult to get a support…
Review.Contenu: it is very difficult to get a support and takes it for ever

Review.Titre: Not a fan of version 8--Less efficient than V7
Review.Contenu: Not a fan of version 8--filtering isn't as efficient as the older versions. You type a few characters and it still shows all the entries in the main window while a small pop-up window shows partial results and you have to open the pop-up window to see useful results. It's better to just filter what's in the main window. You also have to login to each account separately, each time, rather than having the possibility of a master sign-on. I could use the same password for each account, but that defeats the purpose.

I never know what number/name my devises have. I always shout a question to my husband who is not home now. I had 1Password through Apple for a couple of years and got into my vault without remembering my password (don't ask how) I also had my passwords on paper. To have a clean start I cancelled my useless Apple account. I am starting over.,,, Without computer language and with short term memory problems. I am 77 yrs old so need help.

Review.Titre: Almost 2 weeks to resolve the issue
Review.Contenu: It took almost 2 weeks to resolve the issue I had with upgrading to and using 1Password 8 on my MacBook, although it worked on my 3 other devices just fine.  The assistance I received was not prompt, and too many techs worked on it for there to be a clear account of the history of my issue.  However, it ultimately was fixed.  I've used 1Password for years, and have always had better support than this time.

Review.Titre: Bit onerous for a 97 year old man.

Review.Contenu: Password 7 was perfect. Version 8 is non-intuitive, filled with complications synchronizing stand alone and mobile devices, thoroughly opaque and after a full day of trying to make it work, and multiple requests for support, and filling in my "secret key" many times, a pretty unpleasant upgrade.Update: It took much longer than it should have to synchronously balance version 8 on iPhone, iPad and computer, and i miss the reliable simplicity of version 7, but it works.

Review.Titre: Gets worse with every major release
Review.Contenu: 1Password user for over 10 years. What started as a well build native Mac application has grown to a bloated web app of almost 600MB in size. No longer available in the App store, you have to downoad it and install it, requiring admin permissions.Also, storing your secrets locally is no longer possible, you have to trust they’re safe in the cloud. It is clear where this app is going, and that’s not the direction I’m going. Actively seeking another password manager to replace 1password.

The instructions for using IPassword for Safari are confusing—the question is whether to keep both 1Password for Safari and IPassword app enabled in Safari settings>extensions. Here is the instruction I received via email: "You should have received two 1Password "apps". One titled 1Password, this is the Mac app and what you'll want to keep, the other will be titled " 1Password for Safari ". This latter you can click on and follow the steps to enabled 1Password for Safari. Once this is complete you can move this icon elsewhere as it's purpose is to set up Safari. From there it will only open Safari for you and if you already have Safari pinned to your Dock or desktop there's no reason to have both.”Now I have downloaded !Password 8, and I enabled 1Password for Safari, but I no longer see 1Password in the Safari extensions. Am I missing something?I received a reply from 1Password, advising me to quit Safari and go to 1Password>Help>Fix Missing Extension, but I think that they misunderstood my question and did not clarify the explanation from 1Password that was provided above. I do have the 1Password for Safari installed, but in the prior version of 1Password, I saw two extensions in the Safari settings: 1Password and 1Password for Safari. I now see only the latter, which I have enabled. I don't know whether this is a problem. The extension seems to be working.

Review.Titre: Thankful for the help but unnecessarily confusing
Review.Contenu: I'm grateful for the help I received, but each time I replied to the email from 1PW it was from a different person. They didn't always look back at the thread so the help they offered went in a number of directions and seemed at times to be at odds with each other. It would have been much more helpful to deal with just one person.
1Password 7 is amazing, but 1Password 8 is buggy and uses too much memory.

I believe the support team is very competent. Not offering phone support is a huge negative.  It took me 10+ days, multiple emails, redundant tasks, and generated a huge amount of frustration.  If phone support were available the issue could have been solved in 20 minutes.  1Password is an exceptional product, the support team is exceptional.  The way/method they support their customers is antiquated and does a tremendous disservice to their paying customers.

Solid CI've used LastPass and 1Pass. LastPass felt like it was able to fill in things the best, and captured / generated passwords in the easiest and fastest way.On the other hand, 1 pass has a much more professional feel to it, even if you end up copy/pasting individual usernames and passwords in both mobile and desktop environments.It also does a good job of capturing and filling in those short Authenticator passwords.I hope they continue to make the interface easier and more direct to use.

I have been using 1Password for several years, but every time they update seems they want more money for little difference in performance and improvements.  Now my 1Password ver 7 keeps telling me to download ver 8, but when I click on it, nothing happens, probably because 1Password wants more money.

Review.Titre: As older people it was difficult not…
Review.Contenu: As older people it was difficult not being able to contact the support team by phone with our questions. The entire process took us 4 days to complete. The most challanging tasks were obtaining diagnostic reports for each of the devices we have the one password app. We were able to achieve our goal of conferting a team account to a family account.

Review.Titre: Hard to get started but works well once…
Review.Contenu: Hard to get started but works well once set up.

too confusing - I await an answer from Support on how to set up the silly thing! My phone & computer are linked in other ways, but I don't see whether or how they're linked, or can be linked, on 1Password - HELP!

It's a good software on Mac.  I don't like that we bought it for life, then they started charging us monthly only to announce big bonus'.  That was weird.  I like some feature on LassPass better, but this seems to work well with mac.  doesn't integrate well with google passwords and get confusing for elderly, like my parents.

Not logic FF Extension, that sometimes does simply not work, irritating categorisation (Logins vs. Password - sometimes just autopicks the latter and you are lost without a username) GUI-experience somewhat not logic and overcooked. All in all: too expensive, will change sometimes soon to something other.

Review.Titre: It is hard doing only email support and…
Review.Contenu: It is hard doing only email support and also trying to help a minor, when the support people are communicating directly with him and not including me.  I found it very frustrating and it took weeks vs days for a quick phone call or at least join support model.

The people behind 1Password are so pleased with all their hardwork that they never for one moment consider the whole thing is vastly over complicated! I am sure that the people who understand the jargon understand and love the applicatication, but for mere mortals such as me, I find the whole thing terribly difficult to understand and use. You need to get a panel together of non computer based people to trial your products before you launch them onto the public who just want somewhere to store and retrieve their myriad passwords.

Review.Titre: To be honest the last person I dealt…
Review.Contenu: To be honest the last person I dealt with was excellent.  Thank you Muhammad.  Prior to that I would have rated this much lower.  The emails I received where vague and took forever to be answered.  This morning with the latest person all my issues were resolved in 3 emails and with very quick turn around time.  If you refuse to give verbal tech support you must make your emails concise and easy to understand.

Review.Titre: an excellent application...with a terrible customer service process
Review.Contenu: Service provided by agent is helpful, but the process of troubleshooting a technical issue by email is UNNECESSARILY INEFFICIENT!First...because you have to wait a few days for someone to respond, which means the problem remains a problem.Second because the agent might not fully understand the problem, and even if s/he does, it's likely they will need more details...which means you have to repeat and/or add details...which means another 2 - 4 days at least with no resolution.  This email process can take a week or more for resolution!!This is especially frustrating when you know the problem could be resolved with a few minutes of conversation. The 1Password application is terrific.  The help process sucks.  I'm going to search for an alternative.

Application and functionality is decent. But the UX in some cases is terrible when using for office purpose(or cases where you have many credential stored). On the mobile app or browser extension, categorization of "Login" and "All Items" is nuts!

1Password is the best paid password manager, but I think it lacks some basic stuffs I used to like from another password manager, such as email aliases or at least "email +" function. I know it's there with Fastmail, but there are so many other companies other than Fastmail, that I find it somewhat ridiculous that this amazing password manager only gives us one choice to choose from.On another topic, I had to reach out to support 2 or 3 times for questions and some help around certain things, and it was 10 out of 10. The staff is fast to answer, provide help and tips, and feels genuinely happy to help me. Again, 10/10 for support!

"The support team's willingness to help is appreciated, but their response time is unacceptable. Waiting more than 24 hours for a response to an issue that would take less than 30 minutes on chat or phone is frustrating. Moreover, it's absurd that losing my Secret key means losing the account, and that support can't regenerate it, but a family organizer can. This policy needs to change. Fortunately, I was able to recover my data by finding a logged-in session, but if I hadn't, it would have taken me weeks or even months to recover all my passwords. As I use the password manager to create unique passwords for each login, this would have been a significant problem."

Review.Titre: Migration from Lastpass with shared folders
Review.Contenu: I wanted to migrate from LastPass to 1Password. If took a while to find the right person, but Julia completely understood the problem with migrating Shared folders. She gave me C1 a great tip and now I am fully transitioned

Review.Titre: Very much patience with the complex…
Review.Contenu: Very much patience with the complex transition from 1Password 6 to 1Password 8 by the Support Team members. Because we are using the app in German and all communication is in Englisch this made it complex and resulted in misunderstanding on my side, which had to be corrected by the Support Team. Support by phone and remote links to the devices would have made the process more efficient for both sides (the way Apple does provide support).

Review.Titre: Didn't give up in solving my issue
Received helpful response in timely manner
Review.Contenu: Received helpful response in timely manner.I do wish a phone call could happen in extreme emergencies.

I trust the company more than other password manager companies that have been in the news for leaks. I like that I can use the password managers on both desktop and mobile phone. Their UIs for their apps have room for improvement though. The UI is busy, but it somehow still often takes 4-5 clicks/taps to get to what you want. Usually you have UIs that are busy but quickly give you what you need, or UIs that are simply but involve deep, nested navigation. Somehow, theirs are the worst of both worlds. But, this isn't a deal breaker for me.

Review.Titre: Process needs improvement, but CS is top notch
Review.Contenu: Actual sign up experience was a bit dodgy, as by myself, it wasn't clear that my discount would be applied, but customer service was very helpful and reassuring in how to get it resolved and pay the correct amount.
Listening, well thought out replies and helpful advice.

Speed! Very quick and responsive support - probably the fastest I’ve experienced yet. Only reason I didn’t give a five has nothing to do with the support experience but rather because the problem should not have happened in the first place.

Review.Titre: Really like the solution. Could make the UX easier for non-techies…like my wife 😁
Review.Contenu: After a couple years of considering 1Password, I recently pulled the trigger and got a subscription for the entire family. It was the right time for my wife and I who were preparing to go on a work assignment in Portugal (I know, rough life 😂). I had my own method for salting my passwords which worked well enough but does not provide the level of security 1Password does. I’ve found it to be great. My wife has always struggled with passwords and feeling “safe” on the web. She loves the solution, but if I am going to provide any constructive feedback it’s continue to improve os making the UX as simple as possible. Creating new passwords and finding them when she needs them has been a bit of a struggle for her. She didn’t have any passwords to import because she didn’t trust other password protection solutions. Moving abroad for the work assignment was a LOT, so anything to make her life easier is a win. And, yes she could watch the tutorials, but she’s never been big on reading instructions or manuals 🤷🏻‍♂️

Great assistance! However, I felt that the refund message from 1Password on their website regarding my current password manager invoice was not clear enough. It only applies to the business plan on an annual payment.
Reliable password manager.  The only aggravation is you have to sign into it every time you start Chrome.  Other than that it functions well.

Very helpful. Problem solved. Everybody was very engaged, smart and responsive. That would normally mean 5 stars, but I took off one for two reasons. First, the system is such that you aren't connected with a single agent. So if you have a followup question or if something doesn't work, you're talking to somebody new who doesn't always know the history. And second, I was upgrading from 1P6. Admittedly that's a pretty big jump (two versions), but it wasn't easy and took quite a bit of back and forth to sort out. No fault of the reps, but it should have been easier.

Review.Titre: Product works well across mobile and OS…
Review.Contenu: Product works well across mobile and OS platforms, and is in a state of constant improvement.Pricing is a little awkward given that many members of my family have multiple devices.

Review.Titre: 1Password has a modern UI and is actively developed
Review.Contenu: 1Password has a very usable implementation for biometrics authentication on mobile and especially laptops with the browser extension - Chrome on both Windows and MacBook. I moved to 1Password from LastPass which was failing in both UI and UX (no Touch ID support).Where 1Password can improve are:1. by increasing the types of categories for data items (e.g., insurance cards, loyalty, etc.)2. add the ability to 'convert' items from one category to another.3. the field description is way too easy to edit and mess up4. give solid examples, guides, and use cases of how to make the most of 1Password. Including how a family can use the various features, multiple vaults, categories, or names for vaults - all of which can be quite overwhelming and confusing.

Review.Titre: Come for the security, stay for the UX!
Review.Contenu: Following the LastPass breach, I took the advice of my Mac tech friend who said 1Password has a different and more secure structure. It was easy to make the switch, although I wish it had an option to automatically  change all passwords (thus 4 instead of 5 stars). Still, it's pleasing to use, the customer support folks are super nice, and—unlike LastPass—the phone app actually works well.

Review.Titre: I am still new to 1Password having been…
Review.Contenu: I am still new to 1Password having been with LastPass for a long time. The transition was easy, but since my LastPass does not expire until November I have kept it. My concern is what if I have a gitch? But really I have not. Since I am new, I know I need more time to learn all the features of 1Password.  My ONLY grip RIGHT NOW is every morning (since I shut my Windows 10 desktop down at night), I have to put in my 1Password which is 35 characters long. To ease the pain, I have a copy and paste it in.  I suppose there is a good security reasoning behind that. For example, with Last Password I only had to resubmit my desktop password every 30 days.  But for security reasons that is why I moved to 1Password.

Review.Titre: Good enough service and keep going
Review.Contenu: I am satisfied with that you always reply for my question very quickly and detailed. And you can always understand what I need exactly. If any advice I think is that if I just reply the email directly I always can’t get the reply, well if I ask for help from the official link you provide us in the help menu, the feedback always come quickly.

I have always found Dave and the 1Password staff to be more than willing to help as I ask questions for myself of for those that I'm helping to get started using 1Password. That said, I recently updated my own computer and downloaded and installed 1Password 8 only to discover that it is (to me) more difficult to operate than version 7 that I've been using.....

It was a fine experience to get help that is good. A lot of the times when you contact support you can get the feeling that what they do not really helps but here it is fantastic what a fine support team!

Review.Titre: One of my favourite must-have apps
Review.Contenu: The app that clears your head of unnecessary problems. I couldn't do without it. I love the fact that wherever I am, I can access my data: Home computer, web and mobile perfectly synchronized.

Review.Titre: It offers good features to create…
Review.Contenu: It offers good features to create secure passwords. It's also available for Android and Chrome with an extension, which makes things easier. In Android, sometimes it doesn't show the 1Password option to enter the password in some websites/apps, so it's a bit annoying have to switch to the app to search for the password.

Overall 1password is good app, for me it is nice update from bitwarden, still i must say bitwarden have a lot of stuff made better, one example for all is site matching using regexps, that case i can write more complex queries for SSO enabled sites and with negative lookahead i can prevent filling on sites i do not want to... right now, 1password often offer me/or prefill sites that is not valid, yet for some reason even if i set fill only on exact match try to suggest this is correct password... :( I have own domain with star certificate, so anythink.domain.com is valid address, i want to work with domain, but for example: plex.domain.com should be filled with different password, and the global should never be suggested, that works in bitwarden, yet not in 1password :(

Love the 1Password application. I’d give it 5 stars but I sometimes have problems using the app on my phone or tablet. It’s just occasionally so I just switch to a computer if I’m having problems with a particular site. Good job!

Review.Titre: Marks opinion- They provide ease of obtaining my…
Review.Contenu: They provide ease of obtaining my information across multiple platforms. Updates are seamless. Is there a VPN portion I should be using or you recommend? I’m not sure I take full advantage of features. It would be great if I was able to describe my usage to someone and hear recommended changes.

Generally went very well.  My issue was solved.  Communication could have been faster from when I deleted/recreated my vault to when I received instructions on how to resub.  But nitpicking here as there was still 12 days left on the "free trial".I would have liked to be able to restart/reset my vault without interaction with support staff, but maybe it's safer this way.

The Support Team's guidance was spot on for accuracy, thoroughness, and helpfulness. the down side is it most often took 24 hrs. before I got a reply and could move to the next step to fix the corruption. Because my resolution was complex, it took 5 weeks to fully resolve. Too long for me and frustrating. I suspect they may need more staff to field all the requests they have. All-in-all, Rachael and Marcus were great!

Review.Titre: Upgrade to 1P8 also fixed some long-term problems with 1P.
Review.Contenu: I've been using 1Password since 2014. Over the years, synchronization failed because of dropbox full and other minor problems that resulted in family members sometimes using iCloud Keychain. Also, the upgrade from V6 to V7 resulted in duplicate (same name) Vaults.I asked (email) 1Password support to help remove the duplicate Vaults. A member of that team responded within two days. After several exchanges with support, the task was accomplished without losing any password data.The upgrade from V7 to V8 was correctly documented. Help from documentation was usefully styled by telling the task and its goal and then giving details to accomplish it.I struggled to find the sync options with 1P8. It would have saved hours of research if the upgrade had said that sync isn't used, it is replaced by a password key.

Review.Titre: 1password customer support is helpful, with delay
Review.Contenu: 1password customer support is responsive and knowledgeable. Their answers are to the point, well written. THe only reason i gave them 4 instead of 5 stars is that it always takes 24 to 48 hours for a reply, so if you are in a bind (I was) they cannot take you out of it quickly.

Truly simplifies online life with literally using just one and the same password to log in to all my accounts. It works. No more remembering the unique passwords of my dozens of accounts. Just need to remember and use the same password for all. It is well worth the time it takes to initially input all my account log in names and passwords one time to create this "one password" capability. Worth the annual investment.

It took a long time to resolve my issue but in the end happy with result and pretty reliable feedback. Talking briefly on chat or phone might have resolved it quicker but email worked ok. Part of the problem was that I purchased on Apple and that account wasn’t linking to my devices. In the end we cancelled Apple subscription and I renewed directly with 1Password. They gave me full credit for the amount I paid to Apple.

Review.Titre: Not willing to give up on me
Review.Contenu: The determination to help me solve a difficult problem. When unable to solve the issue with my first help person, it was handed to apparently to someone else that possibly could help. At that point, it became collaborative, and eventually, the issue was resolved. I continue to have one suggestion. In my case, with the ability to visit my screen, we could have resolved this issue in five minutes instead of 8-10 visits. You would have saved valuable time, and I would not have been frustrated for two weeks. Nevertheless, I'm grateful.

After the initial set up, which can be a little hard (my mom never got around it), it works great. Having unique strong passwords and not having to remember them passwords is awesome. The new unlocking with your fingerprint feature on Android makes everything runs smoothly.Improvement point - Mobile:I've both my personal and my job accounts on my phone. And if I want to sign in PayPal, it always suggests my job's Paypal password and never my personal. I have never ever used my job's PayPal account and always use my personal. I would have expected the app to learn my preferred account.

1Password is good. However I do have my personal vault and a shared family vault. Now it happens that all password I have stored in my personal account and share with my family appear twice. That‘s inconvenient

Catherine F. by email was thorough and helpful. I appreciate her guidance.  My preference is to speak to a person by phone but my hours did not coincide with the availability.  Phone is my first choice especially with a trickier transition from one version to another.  I did look on YouTube as well but did not find what I was looking for.  Emailing was a last option for me.  Glad she was able to help.

In general, I'm very happy with this product and company. It hasn't had the breaches some competitors have had, and I believe its architecture is more secure. It is aggressively improving the product constantly. It does its main job well, which is to allow me to memorize a single, secure password while it manages the many dozens of others I have.I'm a tech guy. Unfortunately, the product is not always easy enough for most people. This isn't entirely the fault of 1Password: it has to cope with many non-standard sign-in screens. I know they are working to integrate passkeys, and I'm looking forward to that.

There was always a learning curve with 1Password, and it’s always been cumbersome to use on a mobile device. Still, it’s continued to be the most recommended app for security. The app has been changing lately, requiring more learning to figure out what’s up. Some features are good, like allowing one to click on login information when that information is stored in 1Password. Others are annoying, like aggressively asking if I want to save information even if the site has nothing to do with a login and sometimes, in doing so, putting up a banner that hides information I need to see. So it seems to be (and I hope) a work in progress.

Review.Titre: Having been a user since version 3
Review.Contenu: Having been a user since version 3, I can say I recommend 1 Password.  It has steadily improved over the years and is now more integrated in IOS as well as MAC OS.  It is nice to be able to unlock 1Password with a finger print because your "one password" had better be a good one.  And to my knowledge their servers have never been breached.  By the way, if you forget your "1password", they can't help you.

Review.Titre: Great tool, but they can improve the app versioning experience
Review.Contenu: Its a great tool. Its just a pity we have “versions” of 1Password. There should be only 1 version available on the AppStore so its automatically installed whenever there is an update. Having 1Password 7 and then 8 its very confusing, we never know which is the latest version.

Review.Contenu: They didn‘t solve my problem put promised me to consider bringing back the feature I miss since updating to a major new Version in a future update.4 stars for showing Understanding and doing the best reasonably possible.Only 4 stars since I still miss the basic feature.

The User has to click to the link in the details and there he can open the link... I think you should thought about it ;-)Bye Frank

And because it took a while to figure out what went wrong, 1Password compensated me while I did not ask for it. I was a bit impressed I must say...!
The advisor gave good advice, along with some leads I could check myself.

Everyone along the way was helpful but each email left me with more questions. In the end, I was helped by Mat I. who stayed with me until I was successful. That made all the difference.

I have been a long time 1Password user. I remember their Mac-only days. Through the years they gave a perfect service which only advanced and got better at it. Most definitely recommended.

My challenge was with renewing my account and it get "frozen". Despite this status i could still access my data without a problem. Then, there were regulatory issues with regard tothe system of payments allowed in my country. Thr company has updated its processes to comply with the central bank rules and stayed in step with regulations. And as a result credit card payments etc. Would  not go through. While there was some delay over the easter weekend, the support  team worked on the issue and offered more than one solution. The max response time was a day+half (due to time zone differences?).Also an entire response to my query from the support side did not make it into my email (i constantly check my spam boxes even before my inbox). It was a subsequent follow up email that i had sent, that got the team to resend their previous response....Despite all of this, the team was in touch and was solutions oriented and solved my problem. (Eventually. Probably a little late due to the Easter break...) Emails were not overly technical and addressed the problem directly.Happy with the responsiveness of the support team.

Once I had clearly explained the problem, the support person gave me very clear and concise instructions that corrected the problem. While I would have preferred a chat to address the problem, the email exchange did provide the solution and was done fairly expeditiously

Review.Titre: Customer support is great but just slow
Review.Contenu: Customer support is great but just slow if they can improve there time of response it would be better.

As for the product itself, it has more features and speed than LastPass, provides more granular control, has a superior UI, and is overall just easier to use. I started using the 14-day trial after having used LastPass for several years. It was clear early on that 1P was the superior product, but I didn't want to switch unless I could import everything. I had problems getting the import utility to work, but the 1P support team was very responsive, got my issue resolved in a timely manner, and reset my trial period--Which isn't how my LastPass support experiences have been.

My review covers my entire onboarding experience. Overall the support staff were excellent and helped me solve my problems.  My one complaint is the time it takes to get a response to a submitted problem.  I submitted a diagnostic report regarding import problems as I was starting to use 1Password and the response came 3 days later.  I had better response time later, with one same day response, and 2 next day responses.  Perhaps I just hit a bad time with the 3-day response, but even next day is frustrating when one is in the middle of trying to solve a problem.  The original 3-day delay resulted in a month's delay in using 1Password as I had no windows of available time again to work on the problem.I will say that some of my problems were user errors as perhaps I was trying move too quickly, but they were not likely totally untypical errors.  I moved from another password manager which felt more intuitive, but it may be simply because I had used it for many years.

Review.Titre: I was a long time 1Password 7 user
Review.Contenu: I'm a long time 1Password 7 user. I've been using it on all my Apple devices and it just works. I recently discovered my version of 1Password is being discontinued and that I needed to move to a subscription based version (8). The migration was relatively simple but there are two things worth mentioning. Firstly don't expect to be charged straight away (as I did) as you are automatically entered into a 14 day trial period. After which you are required to make payment to get full use of the service. Secondly be mindful of the 1Password site you use when (and if) you need to access 1Password via a web browser (perhaps to set up your subscription). You have 3 choices 1Password.com, 1Password.eu, & 1Password.ca. Choose the same one you chose when setting up the 1Password apps else your secret key and username will not be recognised. One other observation - 1Password 7 (the now superseded version which you will be replacing) does not provide you with a Secret Key so don't waste time looking for it (only version 8 provides a Secret Key). I have to say I was very impressed with the email support I received from 1Password representatives Alex, Paul & Jenn. They were very polite, encouraging, knowledgeable and timely - a credit to 1Password. Thank you. Carl

Review.Titre: really good help from support team
Review.Contenu: We have a really good help from Marcus , Ashley and RachelThey understood well my problem and solved it entirely!The only problem was that I had to repeat my problem many time before Marcus stayed with me and help me so much .

It's amazing and reliant.The day that i have VPN type i put 5 stars

Review.Titre: Great: Software, Support | Problems: Autofill (Login data) only on Android
Review.Contenu: First of all hello.I've had 1password for exactly a year now, and the only reason I got it was because my passwords were stolen from my Google account. Pros:Since the day I subscribed to it, and that's pretty good money for a private person like me, I haven't had a single problem, either logging in or registering, and not a single password has been stolen. The software on Windows is excellent with no bugs. It serves its purpose wonderfully, and so far I have not found a single difficulty. The support service is unparalleled, especially the chat feature, which I appreciate so much with companies as it makes it easy to get a quick response. I thank the staff from the bottom of my heart.Cons:It's a different story on Android, but I don't work with the phone much. The autofill function sometimes works to not at all. This only happened when I did the new (big) update. Conclusion:I recommend anyone who values their accounts and is on the internet a lot, opens a lot of accounts, to buy 1password. It is definitely worth it!Greetings from Austria~M.HEDIT: I found a solution how you can solve the auto-fill problem on your Android phone. You have to delete the data and the cache of the app and then reinstall it. Then it should work. At least it worked for me.
An effective tool for keeping your accounts secure. The UI isn't as friendly as LastPass, but it gets the job done.
Thanks for your support !The support team was responding to every question and concern I had with my account. They're able to respond and resolve very quickly!

Review.Contenu: I got instant feedback and an instantaneous refund. I am very satisfied. Thank you.

I knew I needed a password manager, becouse I used the same password on most of my accounts. The password I 'invented' over 20 years ago. Having tens of accounts on different websites, I finally was able to get all my login information into one place. I really enjoyed creating new, strong and secure passwords for each website.I am using 1Pass on my computer, browser and mobile. I can login to any account on each of my devices with no problems.

Top-notch service here.  The staff I dealt with were knowledgeable and solved my issue very quickly.  Much faster than I was expecting.  Plus very courteous and friendly.  I'd highly recommend 1password just based on their service support.

Review.Titre: Double Spend Billing Issue Quickly Resolved
Review.Contenu: I had a double billing issue (Apple and direct with 1Password). After opening a ticket with the chatbot, I was contacted immediately by an agent who worked with me to resolve this issue in just a couple of email exchanges. He also gave me credit towards my next invoice for my double spend with Apple. BRAVO!!

Review.Titre: The best password manager and really…
Review.Contenu: The best password manager and really amazing support! I had one problem with the desktop app(probably caused by older version which I didn't update for a long time) and support team helped to resolve my issue very quickly, were super proactive and efficient, now everything is working perfectly.

I have always had prompt help from support, rare that I ever need them and never disappointed. The product has never left me stranded on any day for the past 10 years or more. This product and Evernote I could not live without they are a true blessing from Heaven.

Review.Titre: The response was very quick and and helpful
Review.Contenu: The response was very quick and helpful. One email and my problem was fixed. I truly appreciate the help.

Your Customerservice is Exemplary! Customer SERVICE taken literally -  as it should be. Fast, competent and friendly. I was very satisfied. In my experience with other companies, customer service is in name only. Blabla, without content and often very lame. NOT with 1 Password. Also in the past. Fast, friendly and, above all, everything is very well explained and easy to implement. Many thanks for your help!

The tools are great. I love that it has mfa support built right in and autofills so I don't have to go to another screen. The mac and windows apps are pretty good too if I have to switch around for work.

Review.Titre: A Converted, Happy & More Protected Boomer
Review.Contenu: My spouse was a “free” 1Password user for years and has been encouraging me to join the program. I procrastinated for a few years as I envisioned a grueling long process due to the shear number of password accounts.  She upgraded to the family plan and with the assistance of my millennial son (I’m a Boomer) I’ve taken the leap and love the program.  My son helped me through an online search process for creating an excellent password which I used for 1Password;  I have converted many accounts and also stored Passport, License, etc… info for easy access.  We also “share” many login accounts that we commonly use. Like other “things” - it’s a process.  Lee a converted, happy & more protected 1Password Boomer
Great product, great customer support. It syncs really well between my mobile and PC. When I email customer support, they always get back to me within 24 hours.

Review.Titre: Safe, well featured and a superb interface
Review.Contenu: I've been using 1Password now for about 5 years and I tell everyone I know about it. I always tell them that I have more than 300 logins because many people I know use a notepad that is very scruffy and has many logins also. They know that they need to do something better but they are hesitant to go with anything that is on their computers. They think that a notepad is more secure. I am still working on some of them and I have offered to help them to install the app. I have convinced my wife and she now has a 1PW account and loves it.I recently updated from version 7 to version 8 and it behaves perfectly. I like Two-Factor Authentication and I just like knowing that my critical accounts are well cared for and well protected. The interface is a pleasure to work on and does not require a huge effort to use. Support respond quickly and provide thorough answers. I feel a little embarrassed to ask some questions but the support team are happy to answer any and all questions with understanding and go the extra mile with screen shots and markups when needed. I feel much more comfortable with the product knowing that the support is excellent.Keeping accounts safe has become even more important as the Internet is ubiquitous now. No longer is it accessed only by the techies. There are the good, the bad and the ugly out there but I know that my accounts are in safe hands with 1Password (1PW). Just a day ago I had reason to ask about the version number info on 1PW and I got a detailed response. I also asked about a test account I used to test how version 8 worked and again I got a clear response. The same for 2FA - Two-Factor Authentication logistics and using IDs instead of email addresses. All great replies. On any application I use, support is key requirement for me. I have been employed by companies in the high-tech world all my life and was manager of a support team so I know what it takes. I highly recommend 1Password as you can tell.

Rob was very professional, knowledgeable andHe was particularly patient and explained everything technical in terms that were very understandable I am extremely grateful for Rob’ much needed help in understanding 1Passworf

Review.Titre: Noah, Zahra, and Ash - Stellar Service!
Review.Contenu: Noah, Zahra, and Ash all went above and beyond to get me set up with a student discount. Their communication, attention to detail, patience, and demeanor were all some of the best I’ve ever encountered in customer service. They made me want to remain a 1PASSWORD user for life. Thank you!

Hello friends, I give you five streyas, it is very effective, it works with a lot of techniques to feel comfortable and secure with your data and so on. well really thank you.                Dale un título a tu reseña

Review.Titre: My question to Support was responded to very quickly.
Review.Contenu: My question to Support was responded to within a few hours with  accurate information to answer my question. Impressed.

Review.Titre: For the past 10 days I have been having…
Review.Contenu: For the past 10 days I have been having all kinds of problems with my computer. I had to take it in so it could be erased.  In the process, I lost several applications, including 1Password.  As I started over, I found several settings had been changed, making it nearly impossible to accomplish anything.  I needed several calls to Apple support in addition to several to 1Password.  The 1Password staff were consistently patient and helpful and confident they would be able to help get a new app installed and working again. They made several suggestions that proved to be valuable.  That was especially helpful as I was often near tears and sure we would never get it working again.  In the end, they were successful. And I am grateful to them for their patience with my struggles and ignorance and their competence.
Direct and to the point.Unlike call centers in certain countries that go on and on, but still cannot resolve the problems.

Review.Titre: Billing issue resolved quickly and pleasantly
Review.Contenu: I had a billing issue with 1Password, so I reached out to their customer service team, and within a day they had resolved the issue to my satisfaction. I was very pleased by their prompt and agreeable response.

I'm using 1Password for years now. Recently I got a little difficulty setting up a new account on a billing mater. I contacted the customer service team and got an answer in minutes. Really appreciated the quick answer and the professional exchange that I got with them.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased to have several…
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased to have several conversations with 1Password 3 email contact. It was much appreciated

Very helpful and quick response to email questions regarding upgrading and purchasing 1Password. Also clearly answered and reassured regarding my concerns for older 1Password versions working with newer software and chips. Helpful advice in data transfer. Excellent helpful and friendly support and response from Thom.

My first interaction with 1Password was a great experience. I received multiple prompt responses from Julia, who was extremely helpful throughout a series of email exchanges. Their customer service is of the highest calibre.

Review.Titre: I had problem with two instances of 1Password
Review.Contenu: I had problem with two instances of 1Password with the same email address. I was able to login the most recent instance through my Chrome browser 1Password extension, but not able to login directly to their site.  Marcus and Cluad were instrumental in correcting my issued and am very happy because this is a great and secure system. Thank you to both of them

Review.Titre: I asked support for an upgrade on my macbook from 1password 7 to 1password 8
Review.Contenu: I asked support for an upgrade on my mac, via the chatbot on the website of 1password, because it was out-of-office hours I had to explain the question and I was asked to wait for an e-mail response. This response came soon. In the mean time I had already figured out what I was doing wrong. Support helped me further with installing and they showed me how to redeem my discount, very helpful! And a nice final e-mail after I closed the call.
The support team helped me transition from a personal subscription on Apple Store to a family subscription on 1Password with so much ease.  I'm a happy customer!

Review.Titre: 1Password is for me the best Passwordmanager.
Review.Contenu: 1Password is for me the best Passwordmanager to save my codes and so on. A great helpfunction when you are in trouble. A very quick answer and they make a video for me to look to solve my problem.
Contacted 1Password on X(Twitter) and they provided the support email. The support team was so helpful, exact instructions and my issue resolved. Thank you!

Review.Titre: 1Password understands users switching from another pw manager.
Review.Contenu: 1Password understands the concerns of users switching from another password manager. I found that the functionality of 1P was superior to my previous pw manager and that the import function was easy and very thorough. Nothing was left behind. Also the credit for my current subscription made me decide to switch now and not in 9 months at the end of my current. Customer service was friendly, quick and efficient.

1Password’s customer support is second to none.  I usually get a quick response and a quick resolve to an issue I may have.1Password is an exceptional product that surpasses expectations… and it just works!  It’s nice to have a great product to use but even better when customer support and help exceed expectations!I think 1Password under promises and over delivers.
I had difficulty working 1password on my iphone.  All other devices, (Mac, Windows, Safari, and now Iphone).  Emailed and called on a Sunday, and received a response 1 hour after requested.

Review.Titre: I have been using 1Password at home and…
Review.Contenu: I have been using 1Password at home and work for many years. I experienced some technical issues on one of my computers. I contacted support and within two days my issue was resolved. Support contacted me the next working day and communicated with me regularly. I am happy with such support!

1password was getting in the way of everything I tried to do on my computer. I did a general browser search and found others having a similar problem with various suggestions to fix (on reddit). Instead of doing any, I used the support option in 1password itself and had a resolution within a couple of hours. A friendly email with clear and concise instructions. Top notch customer support. Thank you!

Katie provide a very quick response to my request, and her level of detail was exceptional. She clearly understood my exact problem, and not only provided detailed steps to resolve my issue, but also screenshots annotated to help identify exactly where to click and what to change.

Review.Titre: Thank you for actually looking up my problem
Review.Contenu: People were swift, friendly, and most importantly, they actually looked up my stuff and gave me a customized answer AND fixed my problem for me rather than making me solve my own problem. Mad respect and gratitude.
I received friendly, honest and sincere advice. It makes me feel I’ve made the right decision. Thanks!

I dealt with over 4 different people in customer service via email support and over the course of 24 hours they helped me solve the issues I was having. They were all very helpful, detailed and timely but yet I didn't have to take an hour out of my work day to sit there on the phone with someone so that was wonderful for me.

Works so well across platforms. I used to have a family plan which was very convenient. I needed to migrate to a single plan and the instructions provided by 1Password's team were EXCELLENT complete with screen shots. The billing adjustment for the lower cost single plan was immediate.
Communication with Consumer Support was a real pleasure. Courtney was efficient, prompt and helpful.
1Password support was efficient, clear and addressed my needs and additional follow up questions.

Review.Titre: WOW The patience of your staff and…
Review.Contenu: WOW The patience of your staff and KNOWLEDGE amazes me Thanks so very much

Review.Titre: Dogged in the pursuit of a resolution to a problem
Review.Contenu: I was impressed with the relentless pursuit and endeavour to solve the issues I had with my wife’s iPad Pro sharing data as a family member and creating private vaults for her use. Laura Rooke deserves special mention for her patience and professionalism.

Review.Titre: Helpful, patient and friendly support specialist
Review.Contenu: The support specialist Mark-Shane was extremely helpful, patient, and friendly. He provided very clear step by step instructions for how to solve the problem; he responded very quickly to my numerous followup questions and his responses were detailed and tremendously helpful. I felt well taken care of throughout the experience.
The service was quick, friendly, and extremely professional and helpful. The problem was solved in no time. This could definitely be a model for other companies! I am glad I chose 1Password 😀

Review.Titre: Four Years and I Still Love It!
Review.Contenu: I’ve been using 1Password for about four years. In the beginning I honestly thought my 31 year old brain could remember passwords but I forget them more than I’d like to admit. I use the app all the time and the user interface is great. Plus, the customer service is top notch. I definitely recommend this app to anyone!

Amazing customer service that actually cares about us! Helped me get my account back up and running with a discount I found plus a welcome back bonus. I love 1Password the app but the people make it amazing. Thank you

I have been using 1Password (single license) for 5+ years.  I like this product a lot (i.e., in this digital age, it's pertinent to have a well-working password management system).Having installed the software previously (i.e., ~3 years ago) though, I recall it was a very tedious process and it did require help from 1Password's tech support.Now, after purchasing a new laptop, reinstalling the software was required again (including re-establishing the bi-directional data sync between desktop and Android).   This time around, however, I decided to change from a 'single license' (using Dropbox.com) to a 1Password 'membership'.WOW... installing the software via the membership AND automatically migrating my data (password records) into the latest 1PW version was a breeze.   1PW's customer support was EXTREMELY RESPONSIVE (they replied within minutes after posting a question in their Q&A forum).  Specifically, Courtney Hallstrom provided fantastic customer service addressing many questions of mine (e.g., data migration, sync configuration, billing, etc.)I really liked 1PW's single license... HOWEVER, I LOVE 1PW's latest way of having access to my valuable password records from anywhere while securely protecting all my data... I highly recommend 1Password!
1 Password support solved my problem with two emails.  They were very thorough with instructions and had my problem solved quickly and I was able to update to the latest version.
I outlined my issue. Support provided me with a solution which worked for me.

Review.Titre: Not many online entities respond at…
Review.Contenu: Not many online entities respond at all, let alone as promptly and effectively as these guys did.

I have been using 1password for many years and they have always been one of the earliest to proactively improve their products and make it secure yet user friendly. The support staff is also great as well!

We've been testing the program alongside other Password managers to determine which best suits our organization. The support team has probably been the thing that wins us over. Kind, quick and extremely helpful and knowledgeable responses that have led us to trust 1password.
Amazing customer support from Siân-Kathryn Tucker. She helped me sort my membership and was both patient and understanding. Thanks Siân!

Paula, Elly, and Clarinda were the three wonderful !Password friends that helped me so much to recover my account for which I had lost access to.  They are wonderful people and very friendly, and always there to help!!
Very good support and solved my problem with a great speed and diligence.

Review.Titre: Tom Majewski went the extra mile to…
Review.Contenu: Tom Majewski went the extra mile to ensure I was satisfied, even when I had a foot-shaped mouth and the issue was on my end.  One of the great things about 1Password is their customer service is 2nd to none - I highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Great customer service! 1Password is so easy to use and their…
Review.Contenu: 1Password is so easy to use and their customer service is awesome and answered my question promptly.

Review.Titre: I have contacted a couple of times over…
Review.Contenu: I have contacted a couple of times over the years and each time I am reminded of how great the customer service is. Always get a prompt and efficient response with resolution. Great product! Best in the business.

Review.Titre: I first purchased a license for need of a password manager.
Review.Contenu: I first purchased a license for 1Password in 2007. I have always loved using this app and have always recommended it to my friends or anyone else who needs a password manager! I use just about all of the features, besides the password manager part of 1Password, to store my important information so that I can access it at any time.

Excellent product, could not live without. Also excellent customer service, no complaints whatsoever, they respond quick, on topic, and if you ask nicely, you will get a discount. I switch to premium and then to family account due to the amazing product and customer service.

I recently started using 1password.com and I have to say, it is absolutely awesome! It has made managing all of my passwords and logins so much easier and more secure. The interface is user-friendly and intuitive, and the customer support team is incredibly helpful. I highly recommend 1password.com to anyone looking for a top-notch password manager.

I would like to say thank you to Amber, Zahra Rasool, and Melanie C. from 1Password for the exceptional support. Your dedication did not go unnoticed. I appreciate your prompt and effective assistance, making my user experience outstanding. Kudos for going above and beyond. You truly make a difference!

I had a problem with my version 7 being corrupted and I could no longer get into my account.  Customer Service at 1Password helped get me set up with a new version 8 account and assisted me with tools to get back into my account if I forget my password in the future.  They were extremely helpful and understanding.  Cooperation was very fast and thorough, and the resolution I received was very satisfactory.

Suddenly I experienced a problem with my account’s activation status. After sending my issue to the support team, they quickly replied to me. Within a small amount of time support team solved my issue and did great job.
All communications were very prompt! Also, the help got the issue fixed easily.
1Password gave me great support, quickly resolving my issue, which was of my own making. it's a great product, super easy to use.

I've been a 1Password customer for so long (at least 10 or 15 years) that I can't even remember which email I first used to register with them (I should have stored that info on 1Password!!!).I reached out to them yesterday as I was migrating to a new computer and I was having difficulty with the migration.Their customer service team were excellent.  Very repsonsive, and patiently talked me through the issue.  Turns out that I've been using the service for so long that their entire business model and technology platform has changed, and no longer supports my setup.So I now need the latest version of the software, and can no longer use Dropbox to store my vaults and share between multiple devices. I now need to move onto their subscripion model.While disappointing, I can hardly complain after so long.To soften the blow, they offered me 3 years subscription at 50% off, something which I suspect is standard for long term users migrating to the subscrption model.  Even so, it helps a lot to make the transition, and the truth is that it's such an awesome platform that it feels like a very reaosnable cost for the peace of mind and easy logins/form filling it offers.
Been a long term 1password and always great quick service and support, there maybe cheaper solutions out there, but with all your important data, you want the best!

Review.Titre: I had a couple of items--mostly of my…
Review.Contenu: I had a couple of items--mostly of my own making--that I needed help with.  The 1Password help desk was extremely helpful.  They were very quick to respond and seemed to genuinely want to help me. They checked my actions after I had taken the steps that they suggested to make sure that I was on the right track.  They are a great model all help desks should follow!

Awesome product with 5* support!I have been using 1Password both professionally and privately for more than 5 years and have always been super duper happy with both the product and their customer support.I can vouch for them!

Review.Titre: The customer service rep that contacted…
Review.Contenu: The customer service rep that contacted me today knew the answers and how to help me.  Very thankful to have restored the contents of my app.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: As always a quick answer within a day…
Review.Contenu: As always a quick answer within a day which fully answered my question and solved the problem I had. Very many thanks to the 1Password Team.
